intro: Run your own restaurant for many hungry customers!
description:
Handling a restaurant has never been easier. In Cozy Cooking: Tiny Tastes you can welcome customers and cook them the most delicious dishes they have ever tasted without breaking a sweat!


It’s high time you showed your culinary skills and prepared amazing meals for your guests who came to finally eat something tasty.

Mix the right ingredients, add a dash of creativity, and voilà, culinary magic right before your eyes! But remember to read the customers’ orders carefully, they can be picky.

Throughout your adventure you will be able to unluck more components and recipes, once you level up from receiving positive feedback from your customers.


What you can find inside your restaurant:
- 172 wonderful recipes.
- 24 unique ingredients.
- 4 different cooking options - blender, pan, pot, or oven

The hardest part of this job is not eating the dish before it comes out of the kitchen, they are that delightful!

Take your culinary tools and open the best restaurant in town right away!
